body: I agree with the second person from the bottom up
@omegazero2718 don't be, the game this was based off is pure NTR and has no good end add the fact that Yukikaze's mother was the reason of both Rinko and Yukikaze's fall into lust and madness.
For some unknown reason, I feel my heart warming up after reading this doujin
Been waiting a translation of a yukikaze doujin for a long long time
